methods.name: createAccount
methods.description: Use this method to create a new Telegraph account. Most users only need one account, but this can be useful for channel administrators who would like to keep individual author names and profile links for each of their channels. On success, returns an Account object with the regular fields and an additional access_token field.

parameters.name: short_name
parameters.description: Required. Account name, helps users with several accounts remember which they are currently using. Displayed to the user above the "Edit/Publish" button on Telegra.ph, other users don't see this name.

parameters.name: author_name
parameters.description: Default author name used when creating new articles.

parameters.name: author_url
parameters.description: Default profile link, opened when users click on the author's name below the title. Can be any link, not necessarily to a Telegram profile or channel.

methods.name: createPage
methods.description: Use this method to create a new Telegraph page. On success, returns a Page object.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: Required. Access token of the Telegraph account.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Required. Page title.

parameters.name: author_name
parameters.description: Author name, displayed below the article's title.

parameters.name: author_url
parameters.description: Profile link, opened when users click on the author's name below the title. Can be any link, not necessarily to a Telegram profile or channel.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: Required. Content of the page.

parameters.name: return_content
parameters.description: If true, a content field will be returned in the Page object (see: Content format).

methods.name: editAccountInfo
methods.description: Use this method to update information about a Telegraph account. Pass only the parameters that you want to edit. On success, returns an Account object with the default fields.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: Required. Access token of the Telegraph account.

parameters.name: short_name
parameters.description: New account name.

parameters.name: author_name
parameters.description: New default author name used when creating new articles.

parameters.name: author_url
parameters.description: New default profile link, opened when users click on the author's name below the title. Can be any link, not necessarily to a Telegram profile or channel.

methods.name: editPage
methods.description: Use this method to edit an existing Telegraph page. On success, returns a Page object.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: Required. Access token of the Telegraph account.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Required. Path to the page.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Required. Page title.

parameters.name: content
parameters.description: Required. Content of the page.

parameters.name: author_name
parameters.description: Author name, displayed below the article's title.

parameters.name: author_url
parameters.description: Profile link, opened when users click on the author's name below the title. Can be any link, not necessarily to a Telegram profile or channel.

parameters.name: return_content
parameters.description: If true, a content field will be returned in the Page object.

methods.name: getAccountInfo
methods.description: Use this method to get information about a Telegraph account. Returns an Account object on success.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: Required. Access token of the Telegraph account.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: List of account fields to return. Available fields: short_name, author_name, author_url, auth_url, page_count.

methods.name: getPage
methods.description: Use this method to get a Telegraph page. Returns a Page object on success.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Required. Path to the Telegraph page (in the format Title-12-31, i.e. everything that comes after http://telegra.ph/).

parameters.name: return_content
parameters.description: If true, content field will be returned in Page object.

methods.name: getPageList
methods.description: Use this method to get a list of pages belonging to a Telegraph account. Returns a PageList object, sorted by most recently created pages first.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: Required. Access token of the Telegraph account.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Sequential number of the first page to be returned.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limits the number of pages to be retrieved.

methods.name: getViews
methods.description: Use this method to get the number of views for a Telegraph article. Returns a PageViews object on success. By default, the total number of page views will be returned.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Required. Path to the Telegraph page (in the format Title-12-31, where 12 is the month and 31 the day the article was first published).

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Required if month is passed. If passed, the number of page views for the requested year will be returned.

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: Required if day is passed. If passed, the number of page views for the requested month will be returned.

parameters.name: day
parameters.description: Required if hour is passed. If passed, the number of page views for the requested day will be returned.

parameters.name: hour
parameters.description: If passed, the number of page views for the requested hour will be returned.

methods.name: revokeAccessToken
methods.description: Use this method to revoke access_token and generate a new one, for example, if the user would like to reset all connected sessions, or you have reasons to believe the token was compromised. On success, returns an Account object with new access_token and auth_url fields.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: Required. Access token of the Telegraph account.

types.name: Account
types.description: This object represents a Telegraph account.

attributes.name: short_name
attributes.description: Account name, helps users with several accounts remember which they are currently using. Displayed to the user above the "Edit/Publish" button on Telegra.ph, other users don't see this name.

attributes.name: author_name
attributes.description: Default author name used when creating new articles.

attributes.name: author_url
attributes.description: Profile link, opened when users click on the author's name below the title. Can be any link, not necessarily to a Telegram profile or channel.

attributes.name: access_token
attributes.description: Optional. Only returned by the createAccount and revokeAccessToken method. Access token of the Telegraph account.

attributes.name: auth_url
attributes.description: Optional. URL to authorize a browser on telegra.ph and connect it to a Telegraph account. This URL is valid for only one use and for 5 minutes only.

attributes.name: page_count
attributes.description: Optional. Number of pages belonging to the Telegraph account.

types.name: Node
types.description: This abstract object represents a DOM Node. It can be a String which represents a DOM text node or a NodeElement object.

types.name: NodeElement
types.description: This object represents a DOM element node.

attributes.name: tag
attributes.description: Name of the DOM element. Available tags: a, aside, b, blockquote, br, code, em, figcaption, figure, h3, h4, hr, i, iframe, img, li, ol, p, pre, s, strong, u, ul, video.

attributes.name: attrs
attributes.description: Optional. Attributes of the DOM element. Key of object represents name of attribute, value represents value of attribute. Available attributes: href, src.

attributes.name: children
attributes.description: Optional. List of child nodes for the DOM element.

types.name: Page
types.description: This object represents a page on Telegraph.

attributes.name: path
attributes.description: Path to the page.

attributes.name: url
attributes.description: URL of the page.

attributes.name: title
attributes.description: Title of the page.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Description of the page.

attributes.name: author_name
attributes.description: Optional. Name of the author, displayed below the title.

attributes.name: author_url
attributes.description: Optional. Profile link, opened when users click on the author's name below the title.  Can be any link, not necessarily to a Telegram profile or channel.

attributes.name: image_url
attributes.description: Optional. Image URL of the page.

attributes.name: content
attributes.description: Optional. Content of the page.

attributes.name: views
attributes.description: Number of page views for the page.

attributes.name: can_edit
attributes.description: Optional. Only returned if access_token passed. True, if the target Telegraph account can edit the page.

types.name: PageList
types.description: This object represents a list of Telegraph articles belonging to an account. Most recently created articles first.

attributes.name: total_count
attributes.description: Total number of pages belonging to the target Telegraph account.

attributes.name: pages
attributes.description: Requested pages of the target Telegraph account.

types.name: PageViews
types.description: This object represents the number of page views for a Telegraph article.

attributes.name: views
attributes.description: Number of page views for the target page.
